input.sentences: there was a bike race going on .
lining up for the beginning of the race .
this guy had a crate on his bike for water .
quick stop for a beautiful view .
the police were there to keep things under control .
output.sentences: Our caravan of cyclists stopped to rest every so often.
Some of us rode with helmets, others did not.
I was happy when I made it to the water.
It was nice that the police made sure we were safe from traffic.
